io.spine.server.bus

Interface MulticastDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the type of dispatched messages
    E - the type of envelopes for dispatched objects that contain messages
    I - the type of IDs of entities to which messages are dispatched
    All Superinterfaces:
    MessageDispatcher<C,E,java.util.Set<I>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventDispatcher<I>, ExternalMessageDispatcher<I>, RejectionDispatcher<I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventDispatchingRepository, EventDispatchingRepository.AbstractExternalEventDispatcher, EventSubscriber, ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository, RejectionSubscriber

    public interface MulticastDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,I>
extends MessageDispatcher<C,E,java.util.Set<I>>
    Dispatches a message to several entities of the same type.
